answers.answer: Is it the one hour test? I took e Monday unexpectedly but I ate that morning. I guess everywhere is different bc some require you to fast and others say you can eat. Anyway it's not that bad. You have to drink this drink they give you in front of them, then wait an hour, then they will draw blood and that's it. The drink made me feel sick and gave me an instant sugar high and headache. Everyone takes it differently but it made me a little sick. You will be fine though, it wears off after while
Yes the one they say its like a juice but its really sweet

Well if you have no one in your family who has it or overweight. Or have gain way to much weight during pregnancy Your chances of having are slim. And if you do show signs from the test theyll have you take another that's for 3hrs. Then they'll tell wether you just need to eat right or take insulin or pills.
